Contacting MEC This policy covers how MEC ("MEC", "us", "our" or "our") handles its collection and reception on www.mec.com, sites and MEC-related applications This notice tells you what information we collect, what measures we take to protect and protect this information, how we use and share information, and finally, how you can contact us with questions or concerns.

1. Information we collect

1.1 The data you provide to us
When you register with us, use MEC products or services (language preferences and time zone location), or publish content on the MEC website, MEC collects personal information (name, email, and password). You can select information in your profile, such as your date of birth, gender, photo, location, or other contact information. These additional profile information will help other users find you and communicate with you, but you can choose whether to include sensitive information or not. Please do not publish or add personal data that you do not want to be disclosed in your profile. MEC may also collect information about payment transactions between you and us and some of our business partners. This information may include necessary information needed to process the payment you pay to us, such as your credit card number.1.2 Service use
When you visit or use our website, we may record usage data from your browser. We use login names, cookies, and Internet Protocol ("IP") addresses to identify you and record your usage and the pages you request.1.3 Cookies
As stated in our Cookie Policy, we use cookies and similar technologies (such as pixels and advertising tags) to identify you and/or your device, whether on different devices or on different devices. We also allow some other people to use the cookies described in our Cookie Policy. You can control cookies through browser settings and other tools.1.4 News
When you send, receive or process messages related to our services, we will collect information about you. For example, if you receive a friend connection request, we may notify you.

2. How we use information

MEC uses information for the following general purposes: product and service provision, billing, identity verification, service improvement, contact, research, and anonymous reporting.2.1 Our services
MEC may use your personal information when it needs to complete transactions, operate or improve MEC products and services, or perform what you ask us to do. Our service enables you to find and communicate with other language learners. MEC will display your name and any personal information submitted by other users in your profile based on the preferences you set in your account.2.2 Communication
We may send you service, technical and administrative emails, messages and other types of communications related to any of our paid products and services. These communications are considered part of the MEC account and you may not opt-out. We may also send you teacher suggestions, learning articles, and other promotional information. These are marketing messages, and you can control whether you want to receive them. When a user invites friends to join the MEC via email and when the MEC sends a notification to the user related to their use of the MEC, the email address and full name can be used.2.3 Security
We may use your data (including your Communication).2.4 Advertising
The advertisements that appear on the MEC website, products or services inside and outside may be transmitted to users by MEC or one of our online advertising partners using the following data:
● Information from cookies, pixels, or advertising tags (such as browser type and IP address)
● Information provided by the user (for example, language learning)
● Information about your use of our services (for example, pages visited, courses learned) MEC will not share any personally identifiable information with advertisers. MEC may share general demographic information (such as aggregate statistics about members' language interests) and non-personally identifiable information (such as browser type and IP address) with advertisers and partners. MEC will not allow advertisers to access your personal account information.

3. How we share and disclose information

MEC will not share with others the personal information we learn about you from your use of the MEC website, products and services, unless otherwise stated in this policy. However, when you provide personal information through the use of MEC, you will share your personal information with MEC and its affiliated entities. The use of your personal information by these organizations is governed by this policy.3.1 Our service MEC will display your "display name" in your profile. MEC will display your name and any personal information submitted by other users in your profile based on the preferences you set in your account. When a user invites friends to join the MEC via email and when the MEC sends a notification to the user related to their use of the MEC, the email address and full name can be used. When you publish a message on the MEC site or application, you can publish a message, which may contain personally identifiable information about you. MEC may share your personal information when it needs to complete transactions or operations.3.2 In the course of operating our business for service providers, it may be necessary or appropriate for us to provide others (such as our service providers, contractors and selected suppliers) with access to your personal information so that we can Run MEC and our business.3.3 Compliance with the law We may share your personal information in response to subpoenas, court orders or legal procedures to establish or exercise our legal rights, or defend against legal claims, if we believe that disclosure is necessary or appropriate under such circumstances . If we think it is necessary to investigate, prevent or take action on illegal activities, suspected fraud, situations that pose a potential threat to anyone’s personal safety, or violations of our various terms of use, we may share your personal information, Or otherwise required by law.3.4 Changes in MEC business As we continue to develop our business, we may also buy or sell all or part of our business. In such transactions, the personally identifiable information you share with us is usually one of the business assets to be transferred. The transferred personally identifiable information will continue to comply with the commitments made in this privacy policy or the follow-up policy you have agreed to.3.5 With consent MEC can share information with third parties with our explicit consent. Who is collecting personal information and whose privacy statement will apply will be clear at the time of collection.

4. Cookie Policy

● A cookie is a small amount of data, usually including an anonymous unique identifier, which is sent from the website’s computer to your browser and stored on your computer’s hard drive.
● If you reject all cookies, you may not be able to use MEC services or products that require you to "log in", and you may not be able to take full advantage of all services.
● You can configure your browser to accept all cookies, reject all cookies, or notify you when cookies are set
.● MEC uses its own cookies for a variety of purposes, including: requiring you to re-enter your password after a period of time to prevent others from accidentally accessing the contents of your account. Track the preferences you specify when using MEC sites, products, and services.
Estimate and report our total audience size and traffic. Conduct research to improve the content and services offered on MEC sites, products and services.
Ensure that the same advertisements are not provided to visitors repeatedly, and tailor advertisements based on browser type and user profile information
● MEC allows other entities that display advertisements or provide services on some of our web pages to set and access their cookies on your computer. Other entities' use of their cookies is governed by their own privacy policies, not this policy. Advertisers or other entities do not have access to MEC cookies.

5. Information about children

● It is especially important to protect the privacy of young children. Therefore, MEC does not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from people under the age of 13 through the MEC website, and no part of MEC services is targeted at people under the age of 13.
● If you are under 13 years old, please do not use or access MEC services or websites in any way at any time.

6. Third Party Advertising

The advertisements that appear on the MEC website, products or services may be provided to users by MEC or one of our online advertising partners. Our online advertising partners may set cookies. These cookies allow the ad server to recognize your computer every time it sends you an online advertisement. In this way, the ad server may compile information about where you or other people who use your computer saw their ads and determine which ads they clicked on. This information allows ad networks to deliver targeted ads that they think are of most interest to you. This privacy policy covers the use of cookies by MEC and does not cover the use of cookies by any advertisers. MEC will not share any personally identifiable information with advertisers. MEC may share general demographic information (such as aggregate statistics about members’ interests and occupations) and non-personally identifiable information (such as browser type and IP address) with advertisers and partners. MEC will not allow advertisers to access your personal account information. However, by selecting ads, interacting with them, or viewing ads, you agree with the possibility that advertisers assume that you meet the targeting criteria used to display ads.

7. Changes to this privacy policy

MEC may revise, modify or update this policy. We may notify you of major changes in the way we handle personal information by sending a notification to the primary email address specified in your specific MEC account or placing a prominent notice on our website. We encourage you to check this policy frequently for any changes, because your continued use of the MEC service indicates that you agree to such changes.

8. Confidentiality and Security

No data transmission on the Internet can guarantee 100% security. Therefore, we cannot ensure or guarantee the security of any information you transmit to us, and you are at your own risk. Once we receive your information, we will take reasonable steps to protect it on our system. If MEC learns of a security breach, we may try to notify you electronically so that you can take appropriate protective measures. By using MEC or providing us with personal information, you agree that we can communicate with you electronically on security, privacy and management issues related to your use of these websites, products and services. If a security breach occurs, we may post a notice on our applicable website. If this happens, you will need a web browser to view the applicable website. In these cases, we may also send you an email through the email address you provided to us.

9. Manage your preferences and personal information

You can edit your own account information in MEC. You can also request our customer service to change, update or repair the data. Most of the personal information you may provide is completely optional. We will not ask minors to provide additional personal information. You can ask us for a copy of your personal data collected by MEC. You can delete your applicable account by visiting the applicable account deletion page. If you cannot use the settings and tools to delete, edit or request your information, please contact the customer for more access and help
